name: Tanoa Life
tagline: The home of Altis Life for Arma 3's new terrain
body:
### Welcome to the Website for Tanoa Life.
This is an Arma 3 mod that is forked from Tonic's Altis Life RPG
[Screenshot of Tanoa](http://arma3.com/assets/img/post/images/arma3_tanoa_screenshot_03.jpg)

### Plan
Currently this mod is being developed on the Altis terrain so that it is feature complete by the time that Tanoa is released. When Tanoa is released the only thing left to do will be to place all of the necessary structures and rename a number of things.

### Features
This is a brief but not exhaustive list of features this version of Altis Life will support
- Vehicle Upgrades
- Gang Housing
- Virtual House Inventories
- Dynamic Market
- Black Market for Goods

### Authors and Contributors
Actively being maintained by @dbenson24
Check out the [repository](https://github.com/TanoaLife/Altis-Life) for all the other contributors and code.

### Support or Contact
As this mod is a fork from Altis Life, you should be able to get pretty good support from the [Altis Life RPG Forums](http://altisliferpg.com) or by submitting an issue on the [repository](https://github.com/TanoaLife/Altis-Life) (if the issue is coding related)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
